2162.subject: SPED
2162.course_title_long: Final Semester Practicum: Mild to Moderate
2162.descrlong:
This field experience course is required for all candidates in the Preliminary Mild to Moderate Credential Program during their final semester.  This field experience requirement, along with the SPED 577 seminar, provides practical field experience opportunities teaching students with mild/moderate disabilities in K-12 public and non-public school settings. Additionally, students begin to plan for their professional clear credential. Offered Fall and Spring.

(Coreq: SPED 577)
